segments.text: Cheers ! To our first night in our new apartment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's so quiet . I'm not really used to it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All you hear is the crickets and the breeze .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a little eerie . I'm sure the silence will begin to grow on me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I think it's fabulous . And the neighbors don't even seem to exist .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is a relief . It's a good thing we moved .
segments.speaker: S2
